kv4.9:1.1_0: Arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo tīhi phalehi samannāgatoti?
kv4.9:1.3_0: Arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo catūhi phassehi catūhi vedanāhi catūhi saññāhi catūhi cetanāhi
kv4.9:1.3_1: catūhi cittehi catūhi saddhāhi catūhi vīriyehi catūhi satīhi catūhi samādhīhi catūhi paññāhi samannāgatoti?
kv4.9:2.1_0: Anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dvīhi phalehi samannāgatoti?
kv4.9:2.3_0: Anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo tīhi phassehi tīhi vedanāhi …pe…
kv4.9:3.3_0: Sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dvīhi phassehi dvīhi vedanāhi …pe…
kv4.9:4.3_0: Arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpanno sattakkhattuparamo, kolaṅkolo, ekabījīti?
kv4.9:7.3_0: Anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpanno sattakkhattuparamo, kolaṅkolo, ekabījīti?
kv4.9:9.3_0: Sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpanno sattakkhattuparamo, kolaṅkolo, ekabījīti?
kv4.9:10.5_0: Sveva arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo, so sotāpannoti?
kv4.9:11.5_0: Sveva arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo, so sakadāgāmīti?
kv4.9:12.5_0: Sveva arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo, so anāgāmīti?
kv4.9:13.5_0: Sveva anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo, so sotāpannoti?
kv4.9:14.5_0: Sveva anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo, so sakadāgāmīti?
kv4.9:15.5_0: Sveva sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo, so sotāpannoti?
kv4.9:16.3_0: Nanu arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpattiphalaṁ vītivattoti?
kv4.9:16.5_0: Hañci arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpattiphalaṁ vītivatto, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv4.9:17.1_0: Arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpattiphalaṁ vītivatto, tena samannāgatoti?
kv4.9:17.3_1: sakkāyadiṭṭhiṁ vicikicchaṁ sīlabbataparāmāsaṁ apāyagamanīyaṁ rāgaṁ apāyagamanīyaṁ dosaṁ apāyagamanīyaṁ mohaṁ vītivatto,
kv4.9:18.3_0: Nanu arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sakadāgāmiphalaṁ vītivattoti?
kv4.9:18.5_0: Hañci arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sakadāgāmiphalaṁ vītivatto, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv4.9:19.1_0: Arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sakadāgāmiphalaṁ vītivatto, tena samannāgatoti?
kv4.9:20.3_0: Nanu arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo anāgāmiphalaṁ vītivattoti?
kv4.9:20.5_0: Hañci arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo anāgāmiphalaṁ vītivatto, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv4.9:21.1_0: Arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo anāgāmiphalaṁ vītivatto, tena samannāgatoti?
kv4.9:22.3_0: Nanu anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpattiphalaṁ vītivattoti?
kv4.9:22.5_0: Hañci anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpattiphalaṁ vītivatto,
kv4.9:23.1_0: Anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpattiphalaṁ vītivatto, tena samannāgatoti?
kv4.9:23.3_0: Anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpattimaggaṁ vītivatto, sakkāyadiṭṭhiṁ …pe…
kv4.9:24.3_0: Nanu anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sakadāgāmiphalaṁ vītivattoti?
kv4.9:24.5_0: Hañci anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sakadāgāmiphalaṁ vītivatto,
kv4.9:25.1_0: Anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sakadāgāmiphalaṁ vītivatto, tena samannāgatoti?
kv4.9:26.3_0: Nanu sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpattiphalaṁ vītivattoti?
kv4.9:26.5_0: Hañci sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpattiphalaṁ vītivatto,
kv4.9:27.1_0: Sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpattiphalaṁ vītivatto, tena samannāgatoti?
kv4.9:27.3_0: Sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo sotāpattimaggaṁ vītivatto, sakkāyadiṭṭhiṁ …pe…
kv4.9:28.4_0: Nanu arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipannena puggalena tīṇi phalāni paṭiladdhāni, tehi ca aparihīnoti?
kv4.9:28.6_0: Hañci arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipannena puggalena tīṇi phalāni paṭiladdhāni tehi ca aparihīno,
kv4.9:29.4_0: Nanu anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannena puggalena dve phalāni paṭiladdhāni, tehi ca aparihīnoti?
kv4.9:29.6_0: Hañci anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannena puggalena dve phalāni paṭiladdhāni tehi ca aparihīno,
kv4.9:30.4_0: Nanu sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannena puggalena sotāpattiphalaṁ paṭiladdhaṁ,
kv4.9:30.6_0: Hañci sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannena puggalena sotāpattiphalaṁ paṭiladdhaṁ tena ca aparihīno,
kv4.9:31.1_0: Arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipannena puggalena tīṇi phalāni paṭiladdhāni tehi ca aparihīnoti,
kv4.9:31.1_1: arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo tīhi phalehi samannāgatoti?
kv4.9:31.3_0: Arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipannena puggalena cattāro maggā paṭiladdhā tehi ca aparihīnoti,
kv4.9:31.3_1: arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo catūhi maggehi samannāgatoti?
kv4.9:32.1_0: Anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannena puggalena dve phalāni paṭiladdhāni tehi ca aparihīnoti,
kv4.9:32.1_1: anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dvīhi phalehi samannāgatoti?
kv4.9:32.3_0: Anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannena puggalena tayo maggā paṭiladdhā tehi ca aparihīnoti,
kv4.9:32.3_1: anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo tīhi maggehi samannāgatoti?
kv4.9:33.1_0: Sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannena puggalena sotāpattiphalaṁ paṭiladdhaṁ tena ca aparihīnoti,
kv4.9:33.3_0: Sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannena puggalena dve maggā paṭiladdhā tehi ca aparihīnoti,
kv4.9:33.3_1: sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dvīhi maggehi samannāgatoti?
